channel.title: Skillcapes and PVP
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Im pretty much a beginner so tell me all this in ALOT of detail.
I have a few questions,
Can someone tell me the steps to adding skill capes to the SERVER. I got skills working, but no skill capes.. can someone tell me the skillcape codes and the steps to adding skill capes to the server.
And question do. What are the steps to making a PART of the server NOT PVP, as all the server is currently PVP, so what are the steps to making some parts NOT PVP.
Thanks.

item.title: Skillcapes and PVP
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“MobilScape, post:8, topic:344015”]nah, no need for teamviewer.

Just one last question.

So, i did ::pickup #### and it said “No such item”.

Does that mean, when i try and make a shop it will do the same??[/quote]

Your pickup command might not support the ItemId or your typing it wrong. Sometimes the length of the item in the pickup command has to be 5 digits, so if your itemId is 3554 you would do ::pickup 03554 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes and PVP
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

[quote=“MobilScape, post:5, topic:344015”]But, how will the server know that you only can wear it at lvl 100 etc.

If i make shop, will i have to do any of ^^??

And also, i tryed using ::pickup (skillcape ID) but it said No such item… does that mean anything??[/quote]
its ::pickup #### #
and did you need help?
i remember when i didnt know shit and everyone… well some people helped me.
I could teach you via teamviewer if you’d like?
Download it here if you dont have it http://www.teamviewer.com
and PM ur ID and PASS for teamviewer

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes and PVP
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

search for this.
BTW im not guna explain any of this.

if (playerLevel[0] == 99) {

You should see something of the sort…

if (playerLevel[0] == 99) {
itemMessage("@blu@Congratulations, Your Attack level is now 99!",
"Speak to Bob at Home for a skill cape of achievement.", 2677, 250);
maxedStats += 1;
}

Add this to it.

addItem(XXXX, Y);

xxxx = skillcape ID
y = number of capes.
Also you could just make a shop that sells capes?

Read full topic
